tedTalks.speaker: Josh Kaufman
tedTalks.title: The first 20 hours - how to learn anything
tedTalks.description: An awesome talk on how to learn something new that ends with a fantastic ukulele performance of "every pop song of the last 5 decades".

tedTalks.speaker: Alison Ledgerwood
tedTalks.title: Getting stuck in the negatives
tedTalks.description: Is it harder to go from the negative to the positive, or is that just our imaginatin?  A psychologist talks about how to get unstuck from the pesimistic view.

tedTalks.speaker: Olympia LePoint
tedTalks.title: Reprogramming your brain to overcome fear
tedTalks.description: A motivational success story from someone who overcame multiple obstacles and fear to become a award winning rocket scientist.

tedTalks.speaker: Dr. Ivan Joseph
tedTalks.title: The skill of self confidence
tedTalks.description: Why self-confidence is important and how to gain it through repetition, persistence and learning to write your own story.

tedTalks.speaker: Carrie Green
tedTalks.title: Programming your mind for success
tedTalks.description: An engaging talk on overcoming fear, obstacles, and lack of motivation to become successful.

tedTalks.speaker: Kevin Slavin
tedTalks.title: How Algorithms Shape our World
tedTalks.description: An interesting discussion of the importance of algorithms in modern life, particularly in the stock market.
